overallDescription: The plutoDev database is designed to support a financial application, focusing on investment tracking, payment transactions, user management, and notifications. It includes a variety of collections that handle different aspects of the application, from user profiles and investment goals to transaction records and system notifications.

payment-transactions.description: Records of financial transactions related to user investments, linked to specific users and their investment goals.

goals.description: Investment goals set by users, associated with specific user profiles and their investment activities.

users.description: User profiles containing personal and financial information, linked to their transactions, goals, and authentication details.

whatsapp-otps.description: OTP (One-Time Password) records for user authentication via WhatsApp, associated with user profiles.

goal-investors.description: Details of investments made by users towards specific goals, linking users to their investment goals.

collections.purpose: To track all financial transactions made by users, including investments, withdrawals, and fees.

importantFields.retry_count: Number of attempts made to process the transaction.
importantFields.goal_investor_id: Identifier linking the transaction to a specific investment goal.
importantFields.status: Current status of the transaction (e.g., success, failed).
importantFields.payment_provider: Service used to process the transaction.

sampleQueries: Find all successful transactions for a specific user.
Calculate the total investment amount for a specific goal.

collections.purpose: To manage and track investment goals set by users.

importantFields.name: Name of the investment goal.
importantFields.min_investment_amt: Minimum amount required to invest in this goal.

sampleQueries: Find the total amount invested towards a specific goal.

collections.purpose: To store and manage user profiles, including personal and financial information.

importantFields.phoneNumber: User's contact number, used for authentication and communication.
importantFields.financialChecklist: User's financial preferences and checklist for investments.

sampleQueries: Retrieve the profile of a user by phone number.
Find all users with a specific investor type.

collections.purpose: To manage OTPs sent to users for authentication via WhatsApp.

importantFields.phoneNumber: User's phone number to which the OTP was sent.
importantFields.otp: The One-Time Password sent to the user.

sampleQueries: Find the latest OTP sent to a specific phone number.

collections.purpose: To track investments made by users towards specific goals.

importantFields.user_id: Identifier of the user making the investment.
importantFields.amount_invested: Amount invested by the user towards the goal.

sampleQueries: Find all investments made by a specific user.
Calculate the total investment towards a specific goal.
